author: Reuters Editorial
title: Royal London posts 17 pct rise in full-year operating profit
text:
LONDON, March 29 (Reuters) - Royal London, the UKâ€™s largest mutual life insurance and pensions company, on Thursday posted a 17 percent rise in full-year operating profit, driven by a increase in new business across its insurance and savings businesses.
The company said operating profit before tax on a European Embedded Value basis, a key measure of performance, was 329 million pounds ($463.46 million), up from 282 million pounds in 2016. ($1 = 0.7099 pounds) (Reporting by Simon Jessop. Editing by Clara Denina)
